title: Config & state file setup
description: Add 3rd-party config parameters to cc4me.config.yaml (and template), create initial 3rd-party-senders.json state file, extend config.ts to parse new fields.

notes.content: Added third_party_senders_file and rate_limits to config.yaml, template, and config.ts. Created empty 3rd-party-senders.json. Daemon builds and starts cleanly.

acceptanceCriteria: cc4me.config.yaml has security.third_party_senders_file and security.rate_limits fields
cc4me.config.yaml.template has the same fields with sensible defaults
config.ts loadConfig() parses and exposes the new fields with type safety
3rd-party-senders.json is created with empty approved/denied/blocked/pending arrays
Daemon starts cleanly with the new config fields
